1b1(mdo 'grel): bkru sman dang skyugs sman la sogs pa nad 
1b2(mdo 'grel): sbyang ba'i sman sde sna tshogs 'dus par bshad pa'i le'u bco lnga 
1b3(mdo 'grel): pa bshad par bya'o// skyugs sman gyi sde la/ sman po so ni 
1b4(mdo 'grel): cha dang / shing mang ra dang / ka la pa dang / nim+ma dang 
1b5(mdo 'grel): baim+bi dang / bi sha la dang / ga gon ro kha ba'i zer te dang / 
2a1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu dang / in+d+ra ya ba du mo nyung dang / murba dang / de ba ta li dang / 
2a2(mdo 'grel): lto'i srin bu gsod pa'i be ta ka dang / bi du la dang / tsi tra ka kru drug tres dang / pa to la'i sa 
2a3(mdo 'grel): na / ny+dza dang / ba med dang / byung na dang / na dang / ga smra/ nga/ D+hak+Shan 
2a4(mdo 'grel): de la bkru sman du gtong ba'i sman ni/ tri bai ti dang / shrong nyi dang / dan+ti dang / 'bras bu
2b1(mdo 'grel): sU hag shi ra dang / me tog shang gi ni dang / ni li dang / ro d+ha seng phro ma dang / dong ka dang / ki bi l+ya ka dang / su bar na shi ra dang / byar nu dang / ba gcin dang / 'di rnams ni bkru sman du gtogs so// bkru sman 
2b2(mdo 'grel): mos btang ba'i sman gyi sna grangs ni/ po son cha dang / dug mo nyung dang / dAr+ha dang / de ba ta li dang / shing mngar dang / shu dag dang / rtsa ba'i sman sna bcu la/ sa la paN+Di dang / paiSh+Ta paN+Di dang / kaN+Tha kA r+Na 
2b3(mdo 'grel): dang / br-i ha tI dang / gze mthog drung rtsa thon dang / 'di rnams ni sman gyi rtsa ba phra mo lnga zhes bya'o// bil ba'i rtsa ba dang / ag+ni man+tha dang / s+yon ka dang / taM pa la dang / ba til dang / 'di lnga'i 
2b4(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba ni rtsa ba chen po lnga zhes bya ste/ rtsa ba che phra gnyis gcig tu bsdus pa ni rtsa ba bcu zhes bya ba dang / de ba da ru thang shing dang / ra sna dang / yab ni la la pud dang / sha ta puSh+pa sha ti dang / kri ta pe d+ha na dang / 
2b5(mdo 'grel): rgya sran nag po dang / sbrang rtsi dang / ce myang tsha'am/ rgyam tshwa shing nye rong 'di rnams ni bkru sman mas btang ba'i sde tshan du gtogs so// mgul ba yan chad mgo'i nad dang / mi gnad dang / snand dang / 
2b6(mdo 'grel): lkog nad la sogs pa cin yang rung ste/ sman sna nas btang zhing nad sbyang ba'i sman sde la/ bel la dang / a pa marga dang / tsha ba rnam gsum po na le sham dang / li dong ra dang / pi pi ling dang / skyed pa'i 
2b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang / su ra la'i sa bon dang / shi ri sha'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / pr-i ha ta'i lo ma dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dang sna lnga dang / shi kru'i lo ma dang / me tog 
2b8(mdo 'grel): dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu rtsa bar bcas pa lnga dang / seng ldeng dang / shing ma du ka'i me tog dang / rgyam tshwa dang / mig sman sgyer khaN+Da dang / pha bong gi dreg pa dang / sug spel dang / ldum bu sris 
3a1(mdo 'grel): rtsi ka dang / sman sde 'di rnams ni mgul pa yan chad klad pa'i nad thams cad sel cing sbyong ba'i sman du gtogs so// de la rlung nad sel cing zhi bar byed pa'i sman gyi rnam grangs ni/ de ba dA ru thang 
3a2(mdo 'grel): shing dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / sman gyi rtsa ba bcu rnams dang / ba bla dang / a ti pa la dang / smin par ta ra'i sder gtogs pa la sogs pa dang / sman bi da ri'i sder gtogs pa rnams ni rlung nad sel 
3a3(mdo 'grel): mchis pa'i nad chab rnams sel ba'i sman gyi sden/ rtsa duH dang / blun pa dang / ni mra dang/ sman pa sha ka'i lo ma dang / rta ba'i bar du sA lnga dang / at+ma gu p+ta kha sbal bre'u dang / 'a ma se'i rtsab 
3a4(mdo 'grel): dang / nye'u shi la dang / shi ta pa ki dang / gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang / shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa dang / shing shug pa dang / sman thi ra rnam gnyis dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang / thal tres la sogs pa 'di rnams ni 
3a5(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa'i nad sel to// bad kan gyi nad rgyas pa la ni dong ka la sogs pa dang / shing arka la sogs pa'i lo ma me tog sna lngar bcas pa dang / shing muska ka la sogs pa rtsa ba dang 'bras bur bcas pa sna
3a6(mdo 'grel): lngar bcas pa dang / shing o saM na la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i bar sna lnga dang / bye'u rug pa la sogs pa dang / gla sgang chen po la sogs pa dang / in+da ya dug mo nyung la sogs pa sman 
3a7(mdo 'grel): sde 'di rnams ni bad kan sel bar byed do// sman dzi ban+ta'i sder gtogs pa la/ dzaM ban+ti dang / ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang / me da dang / ma hA med rnam gnyis dang / mon sran sde'u mung+ga dang / mon 
3a8(mdo 'grel): sran ma sha gnyis kyi lo ma dang / ldum bu ri sha b+ha gzangs rtse ba dang / dzi ba ka dang / shing mngar dang / 'di bcu'i ming ni 'tsho byed ces bya'o// yang khar zhim la lus kyi sha mchag tshon por 
3b1(mdo 'grel): byed cing rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sman sde'i rnam grangs la/ bi dar dang / dong ka dang / 'bri lI kA li dang / pud+ha rna ba dang / de ba dang / sa ha de ba dang / pu ba bar+d+ha dang / kha sral dang / dzi baN+Di 
3b2(mdo 'grel): tsa phra mo sna bcu dang / shing sha ri ba thal tres kyi rtsa ba dang / lcug ma dang / haM sa pa ti dang / de ltar 'di rnams kyi spyir bi da ri'i grangs su gtogs te snying la phan/ sha mchog rta/ rlung dang mkhris pa'i 
3b3(mdo 'grel): nad sel/ lus skem pa sha s+ye/ sman dang lha tshigs dang / nya bzhin pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang / 'di rnams sel cing phan pa'i grangs su gtogs so// yang lus tshab 
3b4(mdo 'grel): dang / khrag dang mkhris pa rgyas te skom dad che zhing rims kyis btab pa 'di rnams sel ba'i sman ni/ shing sha ri ra ba thal tres dang / u shir dang / ka ma ri tat+pa la/ shing ma du ka zhes bya ba dang / tsan 
3b5(mdo 'grel): dan dkar po dang / dmar po sde gnyis dang / shing mngar dang / ba ru sha ka dang / 'di rnams tsha ba'i nad dang mkhris pa'i nad dang / khrag rgyas pa dang / skom dad che ba dang / rims kyis btab pa la phan no// 
3b6(mdo 'grel): shing shug pa dang / li kha ra'i shing pun+d+ha gnyis dang / rid+d+hi dang / b+hid+d+hi dang / ri dgas kan ta'i ra shing gi zhes bya ba dang / sle tres dang / dzi ba na sna bcu dang 'di rnams ni nu zho skye/ rlung nad dang / mkhris pa'i nad 
3b7(mdo 'grel): sel/ lus nyams chung zhing khong pa rtsub lta bu la/ khong ta sha cher sne/ tsho bar byed/ bud med la nyal phod par 'gyur ro// yang sman pa ru sha ka dang / 'bras bu gsum po a rung dang / ba ru ra dang / sU ru 
3b8(mdo 'grel): ra dang / rgun 'brum dang / shing ni hi kad pa la'i shun pa dang / shing ka ta'i 'bras bu dang / shing tog radzad na dang / bal po se'u 'bras bu dang / rgya sne'u dang 'di rnams skom dang che ba dang chu sri ba dang rlung 
4a1(mdo 'grel): nad sel to// yang zhig bu mig dang / gan+da pri yaM gu dang / spang spos dang / me tog pad+ma dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / skyer khan+da dang / sug smel dang / shing mngar dang / nA ga ge 
4a2(mdo 'grel): sar dang / 'di rnams ni dug nad sel/ lus tsha ba dang / mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad sel to// pa to la dang / ka tu ka ro tsi ni pu tse shel dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / shing mngar dang / sle nyes dang / 
4a3(mdo 'grel): shing pa tha dang / 'di rnams ni/ bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / mdze dang / rims dang / dug dang / rtag tu stug bro ba dang / zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang / mig ser gyi nang dang 'di rnams 
4a4(mdo 'grel): sel to// yang gur rtse sa thos dang / shug pa dang / shing ni ma dang / 'bru'i 'bras bu dang / tsan dan dmangar po dang / 'di rnams ni mkhris pa dang / bad kun rgyas pa dang / rims kyis btab 
4a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang / skyug bro ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / skom dang che ba dang / nad 'di rnams kyang sel/ zas 'ju pho ba'i drod skye/ do ga dang / in+d+ra ya ba dug mo yungs dang / pa li'i me tog dang 
4a6(mdo 'grel): ka ka tik+ta dang / nim+ba dang / sle tres dang / rtsa dun dang / shing mngar dang / pa tha dang / tsir tik+Sh+Na zhes bya ba ci smigs dang / she'i rgyag ni la puSh+Ta dang ban zhes kyang bya ba dang / pa to la dang / 
4a7(mdo 'grel): kun dza rnam gnyis dang / sap+tarmA zhes bya ba dang / shing gi 'dab ma rnam bdun dang / tsi tra ka/ gu zug ces dang / su sha bi dang / bo son cha dang / shing ban dang / gon tA dang / 'di rnams 'dra 
4a8(mdo 'grel): ste dong ka la sogs pa skyugs pa gcod/ mdze dang / dug dang / rims dang / bad kan rgyas pa dang / g.yan pa dang / gcin snyi ba dang / rmad pa 'byang ngo // yang nasap+ta tsha dang shing lom 
4b1(mdo 'grel): bdun pa dang / shing ti ni sha dang / gro ba dang / shre ta ba ha dang / sri ki ya ka dang / shing seng ldeng dang / shing ka ta ra dang / b+han+thi dang / shing sha pa dang / me sha shrI ga dang / tri hi ma dang / 
4b2(mdo 'grel): ta la dang / rgya skyegs kyi shing dang / a ka ru dang / rgya sne'u dang / shing sA la dang / shing d+ha ba dang / ka buka dang / ka laM ka zhes bya ba dang / in+d+ra ya ba dug mo nyung dang / tsha ga kaR+Sha dang 
4b3(mdo 'grel): a shwa kaR+Sha tha rams dang / de ltar a san la sogs pa sman 'di rnams ni/ sha bkra dang / mdze dang / bad kan gyi nad dang / khong na srin bu yod pa sel/ nad skya za ba dang / gcin snyi ba dang / 
4b4(mdo 'grel): ches pa'i tshil nad 'di rnams sel to// shing ba ra'i me tog dkar po dang / shing shi rgya ka'i me tog sngon po lan pa dang / nye'u shing pa dang / tsi tra ka dang / mo rata dang / shing bil+la dang / a za shwa
4b5(mdo 'grel): gi dang / pr-i ha tI rnam gnyis ka rany+dza rnam gnyis/ dza ya rnam gnyis la/ a ga ni man za sna gnyis dang / shing shi klu'i 'dab ma/ bo'u ba la pa dang / rtswa ku sha dang / run 'di rnams ni shing ba ran la sogs 
4b6(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya ste/ bad kan gyi nad dang / tsho ches te tshil skyes pa'i nad dang / zas mi 'ju ste drod chung ba las/ rlung nad cher skyes pa sel klad pa na ba la phan/ skran dang / an+ta bit+ti b+ha khong 'bras 'di 
4b7(mdo 'grel): rnams sel to// yang sman zi shaka dang / spangs ma dang / shing kun dang / nag tshur nam gnyis te/ nag tshur bya ba lam dang / rtsamatshwa dang / shi la dza tra dang / 'di rnams ni chus pa dang / rde'u yod pa 
4b8(mdo 'grel): dang / khong na sman yod pa dang / lus kyi tshil ches pa dang / bdakan sel to// sman be lan+d+har dang / a ran+ti dang / sug dang / bri shi dang / a sham be ta sru sru dang / ko kan+ta ga zem dang / 1 
5a1(mdo 'grel): dang / sa ha ra tsa dang / ba na ni la phus pa dang / rtsa durba dang / br-i k+Sha da ni dang / na la ku sha rnam gnyis dang / kun+d+ra dang / gun+d+ha dang / ba lu ka dang / mo ra ta dang / ka ru ka ta dang / 
5a2(mdo 'grel): shing ram pa dang / parta dang / sman sde 'di rnams ni/ rlung nad du gyur pa sel/ chu so na rde'u yod pa dang / gcin sri ste 'ong du mi rung ba dang / 'di rnams sel to// yang sman sha ba ra ka ro seng 
5a3(mdo 'grel): phro ma dang / paSh+Ti ka ro d+ha dang / rgya skyegs skye shing dang / dzin+di ni dang / thang shing parla dang / shing kat+pa la'i shun pa dang / kuSh+Ti taM pa dang / ldum bu chu skyes kyi me tog dang / me tog gi rtsa ba dang / 
5a4(mdo 'grel): shing a shwa ka dang / shing be ta shra ka dang / e la ba lu ka dang / sa ri bel ba dang / mo tsha rnams te/ de ltar sman ro d+hA la sogs pa 'di dag ni tshil che ba dang / ba da kan gyi nad sel bar byed/ bud med 
5a5(mdo 'grel): kyi mngal na ba la phan/ 'khru ba gcod/ sha mdog bzang bar 'gyur ro// dug nad sel to// shing ar ka'i rtsa ba dang / shing a lang+ka dang / na ga dan+ti dang / bi la shal+la dang / b+haR+shi dang / rasna 
5a6(mdo 'grel): dang / bris tsi ka li dang / sri ki rgya dang / shing a pa mar+g+ha'i me tog dang / pi ta te la zhes bya ba ka ka da ni dang / u da kir+ya dang / ma hA she da dang / shing ing+ku dang / de ltar aR+sha'i sder gtogs pa sman 'di 
5a7(mdo 'grel): rnams ni bad kan rgyas pa dang / tshil ches pa dang / dug nad rnams sel to// lto na srin bu yod pa dang / mdze nad zhi bar byed/ lhag par ni rma red par 'byang ste 'tsho'o// bye'u rug pa rnam gnyis te nag 
5a8(mdo 'grel): po dang / ser po dang / ku the ra ga zim thig le dang / ka la ma la dang / srin bu sel ba'i sman byi tang ga dang / kha ra pad+mA dang / bri sha kaR+Shi dang / kat+pa la zhes bya ba ro hi ni dang / ka saM ma hAka 
5b1(mdo 'grel): dang / sha ba ka dang / shing ka pi ta'i lo ma dang / b+har gyi ka bra'i rtsa ba dang / rak+ta many+dzi ri dang / ka ka ma tsi mon sde'u dang / ku la ha ra dang / bi shwa mus+thi dang / bu trin dang / bu ta ke shi baM po 
5b2(mdo 'grel): dang / sman 'di rnams ni bye'u rug pa la sogs pa'i grangs su gtogs te/ bad kan rgyas pa dang / tshil che ba dang / lton srin bu yod pa dang / 'di rnams sel/ cham pa na ba dang / zas yi 
5b3(mdo 'grel): gar mi 'ong ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud ba lu ba dang / 'di rnams la phan te rma red pa 'byang / muska ka dang / su d+ha shi ri dang / 'bras bu gsum ste/ a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru 
5b4(mdo 'grel): ra dang / tsi tra ka dang / rgya skyegs shing dang / shing d+ha ba dang / shi sha pa dang / 'di rnams ni skran dang / gcin sri ba dang / chu so na d+he'u yod pa dang / skya rbab kyi nad dang / tshil che ba dang 
5b5(mdo 'grel): gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang / bad kan dang / khu chu rnams srel bar byed do// dug mo nyung dang / shing mur ba dang / pu tse shel dang / na le sha dang / al+li sha dang / gan+d+hi ra chu sgog dang / sug smel 
5b6(mdo 'grel): dang / ba tha sna gnyis dang / dzi ra dang / shing a ra la'i 'bras bu dang / a dza mod dang / yungs kar dang / shu dag dang / zir nag po dang / shing kun dang / srin bu sman bi dang ka dang 
5b7(mdo 'grel): pa shu gan da dang / pany+tsa ko la zhes bya ba/ pi pi ling dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la brtse lag dang / dbyi mo'i lo ma dang / tsi tra ka dang / li dong ra 'di lnga dang / sman de rnams ni rlung dang / bad kan dang / 
5b8(mdo 'grel): tshil ches pa dang / tsham pa dang / sman dang / rims na ba dang / gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang 'di rnams sel bar byed do// shu dag dang / gla sgang chen po dang / thang shing dang / sbron shing dang / li dong 
6a1(mdo 'grel): ra dang / bong nga dang / a ru ra dang / skyer ba dang / yung ba dang / shing mngar dang / kri sA par+Ni dang / dug mo nyung dang / sman 'di rnams ni shu dag dang skyer ba la sogs pa'i sman sde'i 
6a2(mdo 'grel): grangs su gtogs te/ zas ma zhu ba'i be'u stabs dang / rab tu 'khru ba'i nad rnams zhu zhing gcod do// tshil ches pa dang / bad kan rgyas pa dang / rlung nad dang / bud med kyi nu man pa 'di rnams 
6a3(mdo 'grel): sel to// gan+da pri yang ku dang / mig sman gan gyi dud pa dang / lig bu mig dang / stang zil dang / me tog pad+ma'i ze ba dang / lim rtsa dang / btsod dang / ya ba sha ka dang / shing shal+la shi li dang / 
6a4(mdo 'grel): shing shalpa li'i khu ba dang / pun na ga dang / sa mang+ga dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / me tog d+ha ta ki dang / a ma pa shwA dang / shing mngar dang / nam ska ra dang / nam ti thig shi dang / chu skyegs 
6a5(mdo 'grel): shing dang / ro d+ha gser phro ma dang / mtha' ta ki dang / shing bilka dang / be shing ka dang / ka tig dang / pad+ma'i ge sar ze ba dang / sman 'di rnams ni sman sde rnam gnyis te/ gan+d+ha bri yang bu'i sde 
6a6(mdo 'grel): grangs su gtogs pa dang / sman as ba shwa la sogs pa de rnams ni kha zas zhu ba'i tshad par 'khru ba gcod do// sman 'di dag ni 'khru ba yang gcod/ nang gi sha tshad dang pags pi'i sha byung ba slar 
6a7(mdo 'grel): 'phros 'byor par byed de phan/ mkhris pa rgyas pa la phan/ rma red pa yang 'tsho bar byed do// gla sgang dang / shu dag dang / tsi tra ka krug trug tres dang / skyed pa dang / yung ba gnyis/ kha ba rnam 
6a8(mdo 'grel): gnyis la/ kun tu ka ro hi ni pu tse shel dang / ka ka tik+ta dang / go bye dang / ba thA dang / 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / ba rur dang / bong nga dkar po dang / bong nganag 
6b1(mdo 'grel): bo dang / khra bo dang / rurta dang / sug spel dang / shu dag dang / 'di rnams ni bud med kyi mngal na ba dang / nu ma na ba dang / dri ma bshang gci ba dang / rdul dang / rdu ma dang / rna spabs 
6b2(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa sel cing 'byang ngo // shing ny+dza gr-i dang / shing a shwad+tha dang / shing u dum bar dang / pad+ma ri ka ro d+ha sA gnyis 'dzam bu gnyis la/ bri had phal dang / d+hA sre pha la gnyis/ shing a 
6b3(mdo 'grel): dzun dang / shing so ma bal+la dang / shing p+lak+Sha dang / shing a mr-i dang / shing mardul dang / shing pi la ya dang / rgya skyegs shing dang / shing nan ti ki li dang / shing bi ra la dang / shing mngar 
6b4(mdo 'grel): dang / shing ma du ka dang / 'di rnams ni shing nya gro la sogs pa'i grangs su gtogs te/ rma 'tsho ste pan/ 'khru ba gcod/ chag thur byung na 'byor/ tshos te tshil ches pa dang / mkhris pa rgyas 
6b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang / khrag rgyas pa dang / skom dad che ba dang / lus kyi khong tsha ba dang / bud med kyi mngal na ba dang / 'di rnams sel te phan no// sug smel dang / ma he la dang / tu ru ska dang / ru rta dang / 
6b6(mdo 'grel): gan+d+ha pi yaM ku dang / spang spos dang / ba laM b+h+ra ma ka dang / sprig ka 'bug sug dang / zhog taM ku dang / tso tsa dang / gan+da pad+d+ha dang / rgya spos dang / sti ne ya dang / spu ma zhes bya ba sri shing gi me 
6b7(mdo 'grel): tog gi khu ba dang / nya phyis dang / rgya mtsho nas byung ba'i chu srin gyi sen mo dang / thang shing dang / a ka ru dang / shri ba sa ga dang / gur kum dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul dang / sa tsi ras dang / 
6b8(mdo 'grel): pog kar po num ka dang / sun+da ma dang / nA ga ge sar dang / 'di rnams ni sug spel la sogs te 'di dag dri zhim po'i sder gtogs te/ rlung nad dang bad kan rgyas pa'i nad sel/ dug thub/ pags// 
7a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sha mdog bzang po sdug gur 'gyur/ g.yan pa dang / thor bu dang / bas glags pa'i nad 'di rnams kun sel lo// sh+ya ma dang / dan di dang / dra ba rti dang / ka mu ka dang / 
7a2(mdo 'grel): de bing shing ha rang dang / shang khrin dang / pat+tA la dang / su bat+ta shir dang / gapag gi dang / shrI khar dang / kaM bi l+ya ka dang / sleHsa dang / shing kArany+dza dang / bsnyad rtsi dang / bye ga tad 
7a3(mdo 'grel): b+hal dang / btur ba dang / shing ro tsha ba rnams kyi 'bras bu ni sman shA ma la sogs pa'i sder gtogs te/ sman dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / zas yig mi 'di ba dang / bad kan rgyas pa dang / 
7a4(mdo 'grel): na pa dang / chu 'gags pa dang / nad 'di rnams sel to// de ltar sman gyi sde grangs sum cu cag sum bshad pa la/ de dag gi nang nas stan la lam rnyed na yang / sman gyi ro dang / mthu dang yon tan 'drub las 
7a5(mdo 'grel): sman sa spyong cig/ bkru sman dang skyugs stan la sogs pa nad sbyang ba'i sman sa tshogs 'dus par bshad pa/ sman sngo'i rnam grangs ba shid pa'i le'u bco lnga brdzogs so// // snum dpyad kyi 
7a6(mdo 'grel): gangar bye ba bshad pa'i le'u bcu drug pa bshad par bya'o// snum gyi nang na mchog ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ kun mar dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / til mar dang bzhi'o// de ltar snga ma de dag ni sprid ni 'adz+ra dka' 
7a7(mdo 'grel): s+t+waMs+t+waM/ bsi 'a khong 'khru/ lus kyi khong snum par byed/ 'jim par byed na thams cad du 'thobs na zhib mnyen/ lus kyi khong rlan par byed do// zas snum bag 'di dang dra ba'i sman snam bgargyan du 
7a8(mdo 'grel): gtogs pa pa la cher yang de dang 'dra'o// sbyim dang sman dang mi 'dra ba gzhan ni nub pa zhes bya'o// de la yang snum de dag gi nang yang kun mar ldan dang sbyang ti bcos pa na ji ltar sbyar ba bzhin du padan/ 
7b1(mdo 'grel): rkang dang tshil dang tIl mar gsum ni mkhris pa drang bad kan dang rlung sel to// de la zhun ma bas ni til mar 'jud ka'o// til mar bas ni tshil 'ju dka'o// tshilabs kyang rkang 'ju da ka'o// 
7b2(mdo 'grel): del snum rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ni zhun mar dang til mar ro// snum rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni zhun mar dang til mar deng rkang mar gsum mo// snum rnam bzhin snam de bzhi la snum chen po bzhi zhes 
7b3(mdo 'grel): bya'o// de la snum gyi sman dpyad bya ba'i nad dmigs ni/ chang nad du gyur pa dang / bud med kyi dub pa dang / drag shul dang / ngal ba'i las byas pa dang / sems las chen po la zhugs pa dang / mi 
7b4(mdo 'grel): rgan po dang / byis pa dang / nyams stobs chung ba dang / skem pa dang / lus kyi khong na snum med de/ rtsub por gyur pa dang / khrag zad pa dang / khu chu zad pa dang / rlung nad kyis nyams thag pa dang / 
7b5(mdo 'grel): mig rab rib khyer te nul ba dang / rnab mi gsang ste legs par mi thos pa dang 'di rnams lta bu la/ snum gyi bcud kyis lus brta bar bya'o// brta bar bya ba de la yang thog mar dugs byas la phyis bkru 
7b6(mdo 'grel): sman gyis bkrus te/ sbyangs nas de'i rjes la snum gyi dpyad bya'o// ha cang khong pa me'i drod ches pa dang / lus sbom pa dang / nyams chung zhing rid pa dang / brla rengs pa dang / tshad par rab tu 'khru ba dang / 
7b7(mdo 'grel): zhu ba'i be'u stabs yod de mchin pa na ba dang / lkog man pa dang / dbyig gis phog pa dang / lto ba'i nang du dmu rdzing lta bu dang / brgyal ba dang / rtag tu stug pa dang / zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang / bad kan gyi 
7b8(mdo 'grel): nad yod pa dang / skom dang che ba dang / chang gis phog ster ro ba dang / bud med bu btsam pa dang / sman sna nas btang ba dang / bkru sman gyis bkrus pa'i di lta bu la snum gyi dpyad bya zhing sbyin du mi rung ngo // 
8a1(mdo 'grel): de la zhun mar gyi yon tan ni sems rnom brjed cing dran pa dang / yid gzhungs/ lus skem zhing rid pa 'di lta bu la phan no// til mar ni ljon srin bu yod pa dang / tshil ches pa dang / rlung 
8a2(mdo 'grel): nad can du gyur pa 'di lta bu la til mar phan no// lus khong yang ba dang / lus khong grims shing sha mkhrang ba dang / lto sra ba 'di lta bu la rkang zos na phan no// lus la rlung dang nyi tshan gyis gdungs pa dang / lam ring
8a3(mdo 'grel): por bgrod pas khong du dub pa dang / sma mangs pa dang / bud med la drags pa dang / drag shul dang / las ches pa dang / srog zungs bdun lta bu zad pa dang / lus kyi khong na snam med de/ rtsa ba por gyur pa dang nyon
8a4(mdo 'grel): mongs pa byas pas lus rid pa dang / pho ba'i drod ha cang ches te zas ha cang 'ju ba dang / rtsa sgo kun rlung gis 'gags shing chod pa 'di lta bu la tshol zos na phan no// de la tshil ni lhag par rus pa'i tshigs kha bye ba dang / 
8a5(mdo 'grel): rus pa chags pa dang snod bsnad pa dang / lto ba'i nang grol nang dang / mes tshig pa dang / lus rmas te rma byung ba dang / rkang lag gi tshig tshigs bur ba dang / mo mtshan na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / 
8a6(mdo 'grel): 'di lta bu la tshil phan no// til mar ni lhag par dbyar zla tha chung dang / ston zla ra ba'i ngo la phan no// zhun mar ni ston zla 'bring po dang / tha chungs kyi ngo la phan no// rkang dang tshil ni dpyid ka phan no// snum 'di rnams 
8a7(mdo 'grel): gang yang rung dus tshigs dang mi sbyor bar 'phral gang bab du gtong na/ tshes grangs kyi nyi ma bzang ba dang / sprin dang yul ngan med cing yul bzang ba'i tshe thong zhing / til mar ni dgun zla grang lhags pa che ba'i tshe 
8a8(mdo 'grel): btang na phan no// zhun mar ni dbyar zla ra ba dang / 'bring po che ba'i dus na mtshan mo 'thungs na phan no// mkhris pa dang rlung nad du gyur na zhun mar ni mtshan mo yang btang du rung ngo // yang rlung dang mkhris pa lta bu nad 
8b1(mdo 'grel): sna gnyis 'dres par na na/ til mar dang zhun mar mtshan mo btang du rung ngo // rlung dang bad kan gyi nang du gyur na/ zhun mar dang sman dang sbyar ba nyin par mthong zhig/ de bas na sman zhun mar dang sman dang sbyar ba'i 
8b2(mdo 'grel): til dang kha zas la sogs pa rnams dang / sman mas btang ba dang / sman sna nas btang ba dang / lus mar gyis bsku ba dang / sman bskol ba'i khu ba khar blugs shing dbo ba dang / mgo dang rna ba dang mig tu sman bsku zhing 
8b3(mdo 'grel): blugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ran pa tsam tu btang ngo // ro rnam drug la sogs pa sA re re ba dang / ro sna gnyis pa dang / ro sna gsum pa dang / sna bzhi pa dang / sna lnga pa la sogs pa sman sbyar ba'i ro bro ba'i sna grangs drug
8b4(mdo 'grel): nurtsa bzhi la sogs par phye ba de las/ snum gyi dngos po mar la sogs pa ro logs shig na tha dad pa ma yin te/ ji ltar zhe na/ sman mar sbyor ba yang / sman sna mang po gsogs la/ mar nyung ngu byas pas na/ mang 
8b5(mdo 'grel): gyi ro zil gyis gnon to// lhag par bro ba med pas na ro drug cu nyid kyi nang du 'dus so// dper na ji skad du bstan pa/ sman bskol ba'i khu ba dang dngas ma btung ba'i ro de yang chu'i ro ci bro ba la logs shig na rgyu lhag pa 
8b6(mdo 'grel): med do// ro drug cu nyid kyi nang du 'dus so// yang ni sman mar myur du gang phan pa de bzang ste/ de la thun chung ngu zos na thun gnyis kyis 'ju'o// tshod 'bring du zos na thun bzhis 'ju'o// tshod cher zos na nyin zhag gcig 
8b7(mdo 'grel): gis 'ju'o// de ltar sman dang sbyar ba'i til mar ram/ sman mar gang za yang rung ste/ mi nyam dang nad kyi dmigs la sbyor la/ sngar ni tshod chung ngu nas bza' bar bya'o// yang bkru sman gyis bkru bar 'dod na kha rtsang 
8b8(mdo 'grel): lta bu zas zos la/ danang lta bu zhu ste khong na yang / zhun mar dang dngas ma 'ba' zhig tshod cher mang du bza'o// mar 'thungs pas nad zhi bar byas pa zhig la zas kyang cher ma thos te khong bkres na mar 'bring tsam 
9a1(mdo 'grel): du zos na phan no// sman mar gyis nyams btsag brta zhing sha skye bar byan/ dro khar sman mar nyung zad bzhu ste/ sha khu gdungs la dro tsha tsam gyi nang du blugs la 'thungs nas/ de'i rjes kha zas snum 
9a2(mdo 'grel): bag zos la chang gis mnan na phan no// yang byis pa gzhon nu lta bu dang / mi rgan po dang / rtag tu skom dad che ba dang / mar za ba 'am/ 'thung mi phod pa dang / chang nad che ba dang / rtag tu bud med dang phrad de/ rtag 
9a3(mdo 'grel): tu kha zas snum pa gza ba lta bu dang / drod chung ste kha zas mi 'jub lta bu dang / sgyid de bde bar 'dug 'dug pa'i mi dang / sman stobs chung ba'i nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa lta bu dang / lto ste ba dang / nad dkyil mi 
9a4(mdo 'grel): che ba lta bu dang / sog tsha ba'i dus dang / nad kyis rid par gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mar btang ba ni/ dro basman mar nyung shas bzhu ste cig tu 'thung ngam/ khu ba dron pos phul te 'thungs pa'i rjes la 
9a5(mdo 'grel): kha zas snum bag dang chang 'thung zhig/ de la nad dmigs kyi rim pa dang sbyar te sman mar btang ba'i thabs ni/ lus kyi stod na nad yod na ni kha zas zos pa'i rjes la mar phyis btung ngo // khong pa'i nang lus
9a6(mdo 'grel): kyi bar na nad yod pa ni kha zas byed zos nas sman mar btung ngo // lus kyi smad na nad yod na ni/ dro khar lto stong la sman mar btang na/ rjes la kha zas dang tshi lanan 'thungs na nad sel to// sman mar btang ba'i thabs rim 
9a7(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ltar byas na/ phan pa'i stobs mthu yang / lus kyi rim pa bzhin du skye'o// de ltar sman mar 'thungs pa las mar cung zad mazhun/ chu tshan gdug du ba'i dngas mkhas bzod tsam 'thungs na/ mar bde 
9a8(mdo 'grel): blag tu 'ju bar 'gyur ro// sman mar la sogs pa zos te/ sku mkha'i nang du chags na/ chu tshan gdus pa khas bzod tsam gyis kha bkru'o// e raN+Da'i khu ba gdus pa dang / ba la ta ka zhes bya bgo ba dang 'di 
9b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis su bsdus pa'i khu ba ni btung du mi rung ngo // gal te/ khartsang ngam/ khar nyin lta bu sman mar 'thungs pa las zhu'am ma zhu gtol med de the tsom zan/ chu tshan ga du gdu ba yang 'thung zhig/ de 'thungs pas khong du 
9b2(mdo 'grel): mthu la/ mezhu ba'i gdung skegs mnan po ma yin sgregs pa yang tha mal par 'ong / khong yang zhing zas yi gang 'ong bar gyur na/ kha zas ran tsam du bza' zhing 'tshal nan kyang ciran du 'thung zhig/ de ltar sman mar 
9b3(mdo 'grel): 'thungs nas zhu ba'i rjes la/ kha zas bza' ba ni khu ba ro bag dang / zas bad kan du mi 'gyur ba dang / ha cang zas snam bag nyid ma yin pa dang / kha zas grang dro ma 'dres par bza'o// sman mar 'thungs pa lta bu la kha lag 
9b4(mdo 'grel): kya chu dron pos bkru/ bud med dang 'phrad du mi rung / mtshan mo yang gnyid par nyal/ bshang gci 'ong na mi dgag/ drag shul gyi las mi bya/ khro zhing tshig pa za ba dang / mya ngan dang / grang ba 'am/ nyi tshan la 'dug pa'am/ 
9b5(mdo 'grel): rlung drag po langs pa'i khar 'gro ba 'am/ rta zhon te phan tshun 'khyam pa'am/ lam du zhugs pa dang / mang du smra ba dang / stan ha cang mi mtho ba la 'dug pa dang / sngas ha cang mtho ba'am/ dma' ba 'di rnams lta bu mi bya'o// 
9b6(mdo 'grel): nyin par nyal ba dang / dud pa dku ba'i nang na 'dug pa dang / rdul khrod na 'dug pa 'di rnams kyang mi rung ste/ de lta bas na sman mar ci srid 'thungs pa de srid kyi bar du/ cho ga de ltar bya zhing mi rung ba rnams spang ngo // sman mar 
9b7(mdo 'grel): dang 'dra bar bkru sman btang ba dang / snanas btang ba dang / sman mas btang ba rnams kyang tshul de dang 'dra bar nad byang gi bar du cho ga yun de srid du bsrung bar bya'o// de la nang zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ sman mar btang ba'i tshi ga bkru 
9b8(mdo 'grel): sman dang 'dra ste/ sman mar gyi cho ga yang de bzhin du bya'o// de la b+ho stan ni sman mar nyi ma gsum du btang ngo // lto sran ni nyi ma bdun du btang ngo // sran mar btang bas nad rtse zhil te/ khong legs par snum par gyur na/ de phan 
10a1(mdo 'grel): chang kha zas kyi cho ga bya'o// de ltar sman mar btang bas nad rtse zhil bar gyur na/ stod smad du dbugs dbyung ba tha mal par 'ong / pho ba'i me drod ches te 'bar/ bshang ba snum la mi sri ba 'byung / mar 
10a2(mdo 'grel): dang snum bag mi 'dod de skyo// lus snyom ste 'di ltar gyur na/ nad rtse zhil zhing lus kyi khong legs par sum por gyur pa yin no// lus kyi khong rtsub na ni tshul 'di dang 'dra ste/ 'di las bzlog ste blta'o// gal te sman mar dang 
10a3(mdo 'grel): snum gyi tshod ma zin tam/ phan pa ma yin par zos sam/ btang ba'i dus ma yin par 'thungs sam/ kha zas log pa ha cang snum ches pa 'am/ bsil zhing rtsub pa 'am/ zas ma zhu bzhin du zos pa'am/ mtshan 
10a4(mdo 'grel): momaN+Dal zhing nyin pa pan tshun byam pa dang / mi mthun pa log pa byas pa 'di lta bu las sun mar ma nun+te/ snum drags par g+hu naM/ gdang pa dang lus kyi ga/ ma ga ser/ stabs dang mchil ma mang / thung du chang bang 
10a5(mdo 'grel): 'khru ste/ de lta bu las nad ni lus skrangs pa dang / gzhang 'brum khrag tshad du 'ong ngo // khong rgya lus dgye rgu mi shes te/ rengs bag du 'dug/ sems myos te blong bag du 'dug/ g.yan pa dang / mdze dang rims nad 
10a6(mdo 'grel): rtag tu skyug pa dang / khong na lto sgo// mgo 'khor la sogs pa dang / 'di lta bu'i nad du 'gyur ro// de lta bu la dpyad bya ba ni zas dang skom dbri zhing bsdams pa dang / skyugs sman btang dugs bya/ zas dang skom
10a7(mdo 'grel): rnams rtsub pa'i bag btang / 'tshal nan dar ba dang / a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / 'di lta bu mnan pa'i khu ba dang / dar ba bskol ba dang / nas dang / ci tse dgod dang / khre dgod dang / pi pi ling dang / 'bras bu 
10a8(mdo 'grel): gsum po a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra gsum/ sbrang rtsi la sbyar te btang ba 'am/ yang na a ru ra btags pa dang / bag cin dang gu gul bsres nas 'thungs na phan no// mdor na nad dmigs ji ltar mi bde 
10b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang sbyar la dpyad byas na/ mar drags pa'i nad 'byang ngo // yang de lta bu la dpyad du bya ba ni kha zas mi bza' ba ni bza' bar myung ba mi nus na yang / kha zas rtsub po bza' ba'i dpyad byas na myung ba byas pa dang 'dra'o// 
10b2(mdo 'grel): gal te mar drags pa'i nad las bkru sman btang dgos par gyur na/ nyi ma gsum gyi bar du kha zas snum pa khu ba drod bag dang / yul skams nas byung ba'i sha las khu ba drod bag du byas pa dang / kha zas drod bag zos 
10b3(mdo 'grel): la/ nang nub du dugs bya zhing / nyi ma gsum du snum bag gi drod dang / dugs de ltar byas nas/ de'i rjes la bkru sman btang ngo // skyugs sman btang ba ni mi sha dang tshil ches/ bad kan mang / drod ma snyoms te zas 
10b4(mdo 'grel): res 'ga' 'ju/ res 'ga' mi 'ju ba de lta bu ni nyin zhag gcig bad kan skye ba'i kha zas byin la/ phyi de nyin skyugs sman thong zhig/ yang zas snum bag gis bskyed bskyed pa/ bad kan can de lta bu la sngar zas rtsub 
10b5(mdo 'grel): po byin te/ de'i rjes la kha zas snum bag gis khong snum par byas nas bkru sman thong zhig/ dpyad de ltar byas na mar dang snum bag las nad du gyur pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro// mar dang snum lta bur ma 'phrod de nad du gyur pa kha 
10b6(mdo 'grel): zas kyi dpyad byas pas ma byang na/ sman btang ba'i dpyad byas pas nad kyi dri ma phyin par 'gyur ro// byis pa chung ngu dang / rgan po la sogs pa mar dang snam bag spong mi nus la/ cho ga dka' na 'phral du snum gyi dpyang 'di skyo zhing 
10b7(mdo 'grel): gnod par yang mi 'gyur gyi gyis shig/ bya ba'i thabs ni mar brngos la sha khu las btang ngam/ thug pa'i nang du btab la blud/ yang na til btags pa'i nang du mar btab la/ bu ram bskol ba'i khu bas btang ste btung
10b8(mdo 'grel): ngo // yang na 'bras dang til mar dang sran ma sha dang / sna gsum gyi thug pa nang du yang mar 'di bzhin du btab la btung ngo // 'o ma bskol ba dron mo'i nang du mar btab pa'i thug pa'am zho mngal ma zhog chu bor la/ bu ram gyis bta 
11a1(mdo 'grel): ste blud pa'i thug pa de lta bu rnam pa drug dang / mar rkang tshil dang til dang sna bzhi 'bras dang sna lnga'i thug pa dang / spyir drug dang / yang thug pa rnam pa lnga po 'di dag dang / thug pa sna bdun po 'di rnams ni 'phral du 
11a2(mdo 'grel): lus kyi khong snum par 'gyur te/ lan tshwa cher gdab po// thug pa 'di dag ni bad kan du mi 'gyur ro// lus rtsub par mi 'gyur/ yang mdze nad dang lus skrang bag dang / gcin rtag tu 'ong snyi ba 'di lta bu la bu ram dang yul 
11a3(mdo 'grel): gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang / 'o ma dang til dang / sran ma sha dang / chang dang zho rnams bzar mi rung ngo // snam gyi cho ga dang / dpyang byas gnod par ma gyur na/ sman 'bras bu gsum po dang / pi pi ling dang / a ru
11a4(mdo 'grel): ra dang / gu gul la sogs pa bskol la thong zhig/ de ltar btang na nad snying yang 'byang la/ lus kyi khong nas drod skye/ khong pa nang gi nad kun 'byang / srog zungs bdun 'phral du brta/ nyams stobs dang bzhin mdog 
11a5(mdo 'grel): bzang por 'gyur/ dbang rnams brtan/ rgan sri/ lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/ mar rtag tu bza' ba'i yon tan de ni de ltar 'gyur ro// snum la dpyad kyi cho gar bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so// // de nas dugs bya 
11a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// de la dugs kyi bye brag ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ dugs bya ba dang / bag zan dang sman du sbyar bas lus la bcing zhing dugs bya ba dang / dugs tha mal pa dang / chu lums dang rnam pa bzhi'o// de la dugs 
11a7(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ni me las bsros pa yin te/ de la yang ji ltar zhe na/ me ma dag la gos sam/ thong lugs sam lag pa'i thal mo me la bsros pa la sogs pas dugs bya'o// bag zan dang sman du sbyar ba'i dugs lus la glan cing
11a8(mdo 'grel): bcing ba ni bag phye 'am 'bru sna tshogs btags la sman shing cha phabs dang nye'u shing dang thang shing dang gur kum dang / a ru ra dang / ldum bur sna dang / e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang / yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang / tshwa dang / dar 
11b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang / 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / 'di rnams kyis sla mor spras la lan tsha cher btab ste btsos la ras kyi steng du bdal te/ lus gar na sar glan zhing bcings na dugs 'dis ni rlung nad 'byin par 'gyur ro// gal te 
11b2(mdo 'grel): bad kan dang 'dres pa'i nad du gyur na ni dugs de'i nang du bye'u rug pa la sogs pa dang sbyar la dugs bya'o// mkhris pa'i nad la ni shing shug pa dang sbyar ro// dugs glan te de ltar sbyar ba las gal te sla bas lus la mi chags 
11b3(mdo 'grel): shing ras kyi mi thub na mar dang til mar la sogs pa snum gyis bsnan te/ yang dang yang bsro zhing bags pa ma rul ba dri mi zhim pa ma yin pas phyi rol nas dugs bya'o// pags pa de lta bu ma rnyed na sman rlung sel ba'i lo ma a shwa 
11b4(mdo 'grel): gan+da 'am/ e raN+Da 'am/ dar ram bal sna 'am ras kyis g.yogs shing dkris la mtshan mo dugs byas na ni nyin par mi dgos kyi khrol cig/ nyin par dugs byas na ni mtshan mo mi dgos kyi khrol cig/ de la dugs tha 
11b5(mdo 'grel): mal pa zhes bya ba ni bag phye ba dang mar chur sbyar te btsas pa'i bag zan sla mos/ gang na ba'i thog du glan cing bdug pa dang / gyo mo'i dum bu dang / phag dum dang / rdo ba dang / sa phye ma dang / gso ma'i lo ma dang / 'bras
11b6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa 'bru rnams dang / lug gi ril ma dang bye ma dang / phub ma la sogs pa thabs du mas btsos sam/ brdos pa'i dugs kyis yul gyi rnams dang dus dang sbyar zhing dugs bya'o// de la sman ku'i lums bya ba'i dpyad ni/ 
11b7(mdo 'grel): shing sha ri kru dang / shi kru'i rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa ji snyed pa dang shing e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang / lo ma la sogs pa dang / ka rany+dza dang / bye'u rug pa dang / kaR+Sha ka dang / shing shi ri sha dang / ldum bu ba sha dang / 
11b8(mdo 'grel): 'od ma dang / shing a ra ka dang / ma li ti dang / d+hiR+YA bir+d+ha dang / gso ma'i lo ma dang / shu dag la sogs pa dang / yul gsheras nas byung ba'i sha dang / 1dang / ngang dur la sogs pa'i sha dang / sman gyi rtsa bsna bcu pa dang 
12a1(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams la sogs pa nad dmigs dang sbyar la nad lcin sman 'di kun sna tshang bar gsogs te brdungs la chad dang tsha dang 'o ma dang chu la sogs pa dang sbyar te bcos la bum pa'i nang du blugs la gang na 
12a2(mdo 'grel): bar sman gyi rlangs ba dron por gar na ba'i dmigs su bdug cing lums bya'o// yang na rlangs pas mi bdug par sman btso btse ba'i khu ba dro tsha tsam bum pa'i khar phra mor bstod pa 'am/ sbub pu ring por bstod pa'i/ 
12a3(mdo 'grel): blugs pa'i kha nas sman gyi khu ba'i rgyun byung nas nad kyi steng du blugs shing sman khu'i lums bya'o// de ltar sman khu'i lums byed pa'i tshe lus la gos kyis kyang g.yogs la de'i steng du sman khu'i chu lums kyis lus la 
12a4(mdo 'grel): bde bar na par blugs shing lums bya'o// yang na sman khu dron mo de gzhong khung lus tshad chen po'i nang du gang bar blugs la de'i nang du lus zhugs na rlung nad thams cad la phan par 'gyur ro// nad pa chu lums de lta bu'i 
12a5(mdo 'grel): nang du zhugs te 'dug na gzhang 'brum khrag tshad du 'ong ba dang chus 'gags te gcin sri ba dang / rlung nad la sogs pa la phan no// de lta bu'i lums bya zhing 'jug pa la kha zas snum bag bza' zhing zas zhu nas snga dro chu lums 
12a6(mdo 'grel): bya'o// de ltar lums bya ba'i tshad ni nad pa'i nad dmigs che chung dang / yul rnams dang dbyar dgun gyi dus dang sbyar la lums che chung 'bring gar ran pa tshod de las dpags te bya'o// de las bad kan gyi nad dmigs shas
12a7(mdo 'grel): che na ni sman khong rtsub par 'gyur ba dang sbyar la chu lums bya'o// mi rang bzhin rlung dang bad kan can zhig la rlung nad skyes te rtsub par gyur na sman rtsub pa dang snum bag yod pa gnyis ga dang sbyar ba'i chu lums bya'o// yang nad 
12a8(mdo 'grel): papho ba'i nang du rlung nad zhugs pa la/ long ga'i nang du bad kan gyi nad zhugs par gyur pa 'di lta bu la ni sngar pho ba'i gnas la phan pa'i lums rtsub mo'i lums bya'o// long ga'i nang na bad kan yod pa ni so so'i nad kyi rtse 
12b1(mdo 'grel): brag dang sbyar te snum bag yod pa'i lums bya'o// de la dugs dang lums gang byed kyang rung ste/ sta zur dang chu so'i bar dang / mig dang rlig pa'i 'bras bu dang / snying dang 'di rnams la dugs chung ngu bya'o// yang na 
12b2(mdo 'grel): ni ma byed cig lums legs par byas pa'i tshul ni khong drang zhing bsil ba kun med zug cing na ba byang lus dang rkang lag 'jam pa de lta bur gyur na lums legs pa yin te lums kyi rjes su lus dal gyis mnye zhing
12b3(mdo 'grel): de'i rjes la chu dron pos lus khrus byas nas de'i log tu snam btang ba'i cho ga gyis shig/ yang lums ha cang drags na nyen du gyur pa'i nad dmigs ni/ mkhris pa dang / khrag rgyas te tsha ba'i nang skye skom dad che/ myos shing 
12b4(mdo 'grel): brgyal ba 'am/ bog par 'gyur/ skad 'gags rkang lag na mgo 'khor/ rkang lag gi tshigs kun na rims tsha bas 'debs/ lus kyi sha tshig ste nag po dang dmar po thig thig por snang lums ha cang drags na skyug 
12b5(mdo 'grel): bro ba 'di lta bu'i nyen du 'gyur ro// lums de ltar ha cang drags te/ tsha ba dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / smyug bro ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang dug gis phog pa dang / nas tshigs 'khus pa'i cha la sogs pa'i sman btang 
12b6(mdo 'grel): ngam/ me btsa' btab bam/ mes tshig gam/ tshad pas btab bam/ skrag bro'am/ snying mi dran te myos pa 'di rnams lta bu la/ lums rtsi e ra NA dang / nye'u shing lta bu dang / nya dang chu bya sna tshogs lta bu ni 
12b7(mdo 'grel): bsil zhing lci ba'o// tsha zhing rno ba na le sham lta bu dang / drod che ba'i sman tshid ka dang / dbyi mo'i lo ma 'di lta bu rnams sbyar te so so'i nad dmigs las lums ci rigs par byas na nad dmigs kyi nyen de lta bur mi 'gyur 
12b8(mdo 'grel): ro// lums cir bzang ba ni rmon zhing zhu ba yod pa sra te chos dka' ba spyi bag dang / 'byar bag du 'dug pa dang / snum bag dang / rtsub pa'i bag dang / rtsa'i nang du 'gror rung ba/ zhib pa de lta bu'i sman ni lums rtsir 
13a1(mdo 'grel): / bzang po/ lums kyis nad dang / nyen du mi 'gyur ba'i sman rtsi ni 'jam pa dang / rtsub pa dang / zhib pa dang / 'byar ba spyi bag 'dug pa dang / zhu ba ga shar bag can 'di lta bu la sbyar na lums legs 
13a2(mdo 'grel): te nad du gyur pa la rtse zhil te phan par 'gyur ro// mdor na smanakha ba dang / bskab dang / mngar bka 'di gsum yod pa phal cher sbyar na lums nyes pa'i nad thams cad rtsa gzhil cing phan par 'gyur ro// de ltar 
13a3(mdo 'grel): lums ha cang drags pa las nad du gyur pa de slar bcos pa'i thabs kyis nad rtse zhil bar 'gyur te/ phan pa'i rtags ni gong du lums drags pa'i nyen smos pa rnams byang la nyams stobs skye bar tshor na de ni lums drags 
13a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i nad phyin pa zhes bya'o// yang lums drags ches te nad tu gyur pa de rtse zhil ba'i thabs ha cang drags ches na yang / sha mdangs kyi pags pa dang chu ba dang / rkang lag rnams 'khums par 'gyur/ snying 'phang zhing na smra 
13a5(mdo 'grel): mi nus 'grams pa'i nya byung ste lhung mchu dang lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / pags pa rnams nag por 'gyur ba de lta ni ha cang rtse gzhi la drags pa'i nad yin no// de la dugs byar mi rung ba'i dmigs ni ha cang tshon po sbom po dang 
13a6(mdo 'grel): rlung ches te khong rtsub pa dang / rid par gyur te nyams chung ba dang / brgyal ba dang sngar lums drags pa las slar gso zhing dpyad bya dgos pa dang / glon pa dang / glo rdol ba dang / so gzungs bdun po zad de lus 
13a7(mdo 'grel): skam por song ba dang / lus khur ram las kyis dub pa lta bu dang / chang las nad du gyur pa lta bu dang / mig rab rib za ba dang / dmu rdzing du gyur te lto ba cher skyes pa dang / shu ba mched pa dang / mdze nad dang 'or nad 
13a8(mdo 'grel): sgang bag dang / tsha ba mkhris pa'i nad yod pa dang 'o ma dang zho dang mar 'thungs pa dang / sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa dang bkru sman btang ba dang / lus snad pa dang gzhang 'brum khrag tshad 'ong ba dang / sems 'khrugs 
13b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang / mya ngan gyis btab pa dang / 'jigs shing bag tsha ba lta bu yod pa dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa 'am mig ser gyis btab pa 'am/ skya srab kyi nad yod pa 'am gcin snyi ste rtag tu 'ong ba 'di lta bu dang / spyir 
13b2(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa'i nad yod pas tsha ba'i nad che ba 'di lta bu la lums byar mi rung bud med sbrum ma dang / zla mtshan zags pa dang / bu btsas pa lta bu dang / 'di lta bu la lums byung mi rung ngo // gal te sbrum ma'am zla mtshan 
13b3(mdo 'grel): zag pa dang bu btsas pa 'di lta bu la lums mi byar mi rung ba 'am/ dug gis phog ste lums bya dgos na yang lums mi drag pa 'jam por gyis shig/ de la lums bya ba'i bya ba'i nad dmigs ni bad kan ches te 
13b4(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang / cham pas btab pa dang / skyigs bus btab pa dang / lto spos pa dang / bshang gci gnyis ka 'gags te dbyung du mi rung ba dang / mgul subs shing skad 'gags 
13b5(mdo 'grel): dang / rlu na gyibag tum bde pa dang / ba ga sngas pa dang / berngas pas yang de ma chen pan pa dang / lus dan namig bang des pa dang / sras sdeb dang / kyid pad pa dang / 
13b6(mdo 'grel): bar rdol ba'i nad dang / dargan lus nang du rku ba 'am/ phyir dgye ba'i nad kyang rung rlung nad kyis zug thabs su na pa dang / chu 'gags pa dang / thor bu chen po byung ba 'am/ rmen bu skrangs pa 'am/ pags pa'i nang du 
13b7(mdo 'grel): tho bu 'byung ba phyir rdol du mi rung ba lta bu dang / skyes bu khu ba 'gags te 'ong du mi rung ba dang rlung nad che ba dang / 'di rnams lta bu la so so'i nad dmigs dang mthun par sman sbyar la lums dang dugs bya'o// yang me la 
13b8(mdo 'grel): rlung da yod pa'amatshas te chel ches pa'am/ pad gan rgyas pa de lta bu la zhums bcos shing gdugadu ba mi dgos par khang ba rlung med pa rjon po'i nang du gos bsros la dron pa rtson te rdul dbyung ba dang gis lci bar gyon cing rdul par 
14a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang / spangs par bya zhing rdul gdon par byas na lams b+ha ba~M gos par ban no// yang me la btso ba'i lus bcan por ma yin par tha mal par thar dang / sman du sbyar bas btsos pas lus la 
14a2(mdo 'grel): dkri zhing bdug pa dang / chang mang du blud la dugs byas na phan no// rdul mang du dbyung ba'i thabs dang / khro bar byas pas rdul dbyung ba dang / bkres par bya ba dang / skom par bya ba dang / nyi tshan la bzhag pa 'di 
14a3(mdo 'grel): lta bus kyang bad kan la sogs pa'i nad lungs bya mi dgos par phyin par rung ngo // de lta ba sar lus dang khong pa nang gi dad yod pa la mar dang til la sogs pa sna byed pyad kyis ni rad bskul lo// nad bsgral ba de 
14a4(mdo 'grel): khod pa nang khol gyinang du song yang rung srog gzungs bdun bya nang du song ngab rkang lag gnang du sa dang nad rung ba'i dang duzhen kyang rung / de lta bral lums sa ma dugs byas na bum gyis bskal ba nad da kyi/ ngas par 
14a5(mdo 'grel): b+ha nas khong du sdud do// khong du dad lus pa dang bkru ldan byas bkrus te nad kyis dbyis dbyung ngo // dugs dang lums kyi cho ga ste le'u bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// // sngags ldan dang bkra blan btang ba'i cho ga'i le ru btso 
14a6(mdo 'grel): brgyad pa bshad par bya'o// bad kan rgyas pa'i nad dam ban kan rgyas pa rlung ngam/ mkhris pa dang 'dres kyang rung ste/ de lta bu'i sAr la thugs sman thong zhig/ tshul 'di dang 'dra bar mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad la ni 
14a7(mdo 'grel): bkru sman thong zhig/ yang rims gsar ba dang / tshad pa 'khru ba dang / thur du mkhris pa dang khrag tu 'khru ba dang / blo gcod chen po skem byed dang / mdze dang gcin kwi ba dang / 'bru ma chen dang thor bu 'byung ba'i nad dang / 
14a8(mdo 'grel): rkang pa cher spangs pa'i nad dang snying mi dran te myos par byur pa dang / lung ba lu ba dang / dbugs me bde ba dang / sting 'phar ba dang / bud med na man pa dang / ro stod yan chad kyi na dme pa 'di rnams dang nad thams cad 
14b1(mdo 'grel): lalasngags sman btang na pan no// de la skyugs sman btang du mi rung ba'i nad dmigs ni bud med sbrum ma dang / rlung nad yod de khong rtsub pa dang / bkres pa dang rtag tu sdug bsngal ba dang byis pa chung ngu dang / mi rgan po dang skem 
14b2(mdo 'grel): po dang tshe ste sbom po dang blo kam na pa dang / mtshon gyis rmas pa dang / nyams chung ba dang / rtag tu smon pa dang / mcher ban ba dang / mig rab rib khyer ba dang / lton srin bu yod pa dang / khar khrag dang / rlung du 'dres 
14b3(mdo 'grel): par 'byung ba dang / son pa dang / skad 'dzer ba dang / chu sreb dang / dmu rdzing dang / sran dang / sman btang ba yang yang slon du mi rung ba dang / ha cang drod che ba dang / gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang / rtug skam gyis btab pa 
14b4(mdo 'grel): dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / rtsibs logs rdo bzhin sra bas rem rem bor nad dkyil chags pa dang / glo na ste rtsibs logs su zug pa dang / rlung nad kyi bag 'di lta bu la skyugs sman btang du mi rung ngo // yang khrag sman btang du 
14b5(mdo 'grel): mi rung ba ni btsan dug 'thungs sam/ dbyig dug 'thungs sa mkha zas ma zhu ba'am/ kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa 'am/ be'u snabs las rims su gyur tam/ rtag tu skyugs sman btang yang skyugs tu mi rung ba la 
14b6(mdo 'grel): skyugs sman mi btang bar/ gong du smos kyang dug 'thungs sam/ skyugs sman mi btang du mi rung ba'i nad dmigs zhig yin na 'di rnams lta bu la skyugs sman thong zhig/ nad dmigs gzhan dang sbyar te skyugs sman btang ba'i 
14b7(mdo 'grel): rjes la sman gyi dud pa sdu gu gnas btang ste bdug tu rung ngo // btsan dug dang dbyig dug gis phog pa dang / zas ma zhu ba'am/ kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa 'di rnams lta bu la skyugs sman btang ba'i rjes la dud pa sbu gu nas btang zhing 
14b8(mdo 'grel): bdug pa dang / zas kyi tshogs bstan pa 'di rnams byar mi rung ngo // de la bkru sman gyis bkru zhing gsor rung ba'i nad ni sman dang gzhang 'brum khrag tshad 'brum bu dang gzhogs phyed na ste bskyod mi nus pa dang / mig ser dang 
15a1(mdo 'grel): rims yun du lon te bying pa dang / da mu rdzing dang / dbyig dug dang / rtag tu skrag pa dang / mcher pan pa dang / sha mdog ser por gyur pa'i nad dang / mig rab rib za ba dang / mig sngon por gyur pa dang mig 
15a2(mdo 'grel): rtsi bor za ba dang long ga na ste lte ba'i 'og tu na ba dang / mo mtshan na ba dang / pho mtshan na ba dang / khong pa'i nang kun na ba dang / ston srin bu yod pa dang / rma red pa dang dreg gam khar khrag dang rlung 'dres par skyug gam/ mgo bo 
15a3(mdo 'grel): yan chad kyi nad dang / khrag rgyas pa dang / gcin 'gag cing sri ba dang / rtug skam gyis btab pa 'di rnams lta bu la bkru sman gyis bkrus na phan no// mdze nad dang / gcin ste ste za khur byung ba la ni/ skyugs sman btang na phan 
15a4(mdo 'grel): no// rims sa pa dang / pho ba'i drod chung ba dang / mkhris pa dang / khrag tshad du byung ba dang / blo dzal tam/ lus rmas sam/ gnang 'brum zag tshad 'ong ba 'am/ khong du mtshon lus te ma phyin pa dag ltos ste 'khrung me 
15a5(mdo 'grel): rung ba dang / lus tsho ste tshil che ba dang / skem po dang 'di rnams lta bu la bkru sman bting zhing bkrur mi rung ngo // de la skyugs sman dang bkru sman gnyis gang yang rung ba'i dus ni grang dro ran pa'i dus la bya ste/ de yang dpyid zla
15a6(mdo 'grel): 'bring dang dbyar zla tha chung dang / ston zla tha chung dang zla ba 'di rnams la bkru sman dang sngags sman gang yang rung ba btang du rung ngo // dus 'di'i tshe snum btang ba'i cho ga bzhin du yang byas/ dugs dang lums kyang cho ga bzhin du bsal 
15a7(mdo 'grel): sang spyugs sman gtong na der bad kan bslong pa'i kha zas nya dang til dang / ma sha mon sran dre'u dang / bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i zas rnams zos la/ mtshan mo gnyid log par byas nas kha zas legs par zhu ba dang / nang 
15a8(mdo 'grel): par lus bsrung ba'i bkra shis byas la kha zas gzhan me za bar skyugs sman btang / me rgan po dang / byis pa dang / nyams chung ngu skye ba dang / sman stobs chung zhing zhan pa 'di rnams so so'i rigs par btang ba'i thabs ni 
15b1(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa rgyas shing tsha ba che na 'o ma dang bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/ bu ram gyi khu ba las thong zhig/ rlung nad la ni sha khu'am/ mar khu'am thug pa dang snam bag las thong zhig/ bad kan rgyas pa la ni sbrang rtsi'i khu ba dang / 
15b2(mdo 'grel): chang dang chu dron po las btang ngo // rgan gzhon dang nyams che chung gi thabs kyang tshul 'di bzhin du sbyar ro// skyugs sman btang ba yang babs cher 'thungs te gre ba man chad gang bar gyi sa la smon no// so so'i nad 
15b3(mdo 'grel): dmigs dang sbyar te/ skyugs sman du gtong ba yang rung ba'i nad du sbrang rtsi dang / rgya ma tshwa dang / lce myang tsha yang btab la mi'i tshod dang / skyugs pa swa sti'i bod du sbyor la sman thong zhig/ sman gtong ba'i tshe nad pa'i kha 
15b4(mdo 'grel): shar phyogs su bltas la sman blud do// sngags kyis kyang gdab par bya'o// bram+ba dak+Sha shi be/ bud dren dra/ b+ha tsan+d+ra arka nI lan la/ ri dir su ma b+huta sad+d+ha sa tsa pany+tsA pa/ sa ra yen me ba ri Shi na mad bA me me ra ta ma sud+d+he bod 
15b5(mdo 'grel): ta ma nA ga nAn b+he Shud dz+ya ma na mastu s+t+wa~M/ skyugs sman 'thungs la skad cig ci ran du bsdad la de nas slon bro ba'i sems bskyed la/ dang kar 'khyil cing khar mchil ma mang po 'ong bar gyur na bya sgro 'jam po 'am/ chu bsnyi ba 
15b6(mdo 'grel): 'jam pos bkug cing drang ngo // bkug cing smon pa ni gre ba dang lce khyi ba'i drung ma smad par smon to// de la skyug mi bro bzhin du yang nan gyis skyugs shing smon du mi rung ngo // skyug bro bzhin smon par gyur na yang ma 'gegs par smon ci/ 
15b7(mdo 'grel): de ltar smon pa'i tshe na stan mthon po pus mo'i thad ka tsam du mtho ba'i steng du tsog pur 'dug la 'bral ba dang / tho g.yas g.yon mis bsten nas smon te/ de'i tshe smon pa de lte ba'i thad kar btsir/ rgyab nas btsir zhing gyen du phul 
15b8(mdo 'grel): la smon cig/ de la bad kan rgyas pa'i sngags sman ni sman no ba'i bag la na le sham lta bu dang / bsil bag tu u sher 'am/ tsan dan nam/ ga pur lta bu la sogs pa la sbyar ro// drod che ba'i bag la tsi tra ka/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba 
16a1(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa lta bu dang / tsha bar gtogs pa tsha ba rnam gsum dang / shing kru la sogs pa 'di lta bu las skyugs sman du sbyar te btang ngo // mkhris pa rgyas pa'i skyugs sman ni ro mngar bag shing mngar 'o ma'am 
16a2(mdo 'grel): buram shing gi khra ba 'am/ kha ra 'am/ thun 'bru lta bu dang / bsil bag Ta u she ra'am/ tsan dan nam/ gapur la sogs pa la sbyar ro// rlung dang bad kan du 'dres pa'i nad lani mngar bag dang sgrar ba dang lan tshwa las 
16a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar la btang ngo // de ltar sbyar du sbyar te gyen du phol nas nad phyin pa'i tshad ni bad kan 'byung ba zad nas mkhris pa snang gi bar du smon cing skyugs shig/ gal te skyugs sman btang ba las sman gyi mthu shugs zhan te/ babs char 
16a4(mdo 'grel): me smon tam sman 'ga' zhig slar brgal na bstan pa'i dpyad ni/ pi paM ling dang / myu rur dang / yungs kar rnams shel tsha dkar po'am lce myang tshwa'i sbyor la/ yang yang smon cig sman gyis de ltar bsnan kyang smon du mi rung na 
16a5(mdo 'grel): 'jug tu rlung gi tshul dbu ba lta bu 'byung ba ni/ skyugs sman legs pa yin no// de la ha cang skyugs sman drags pa'am nad dkyil chen mang du smon pa'i rjes la dbu ba dang khrag tshon bag du byung na gso dka' ba yin no// de ltar sman 
16a6(mdo 'grel): drags te ma legs sam nad dkyil ches te nyams chud la smon drags na khong rgya lus tsha/ gre bskam/ mig gis mthong ste mun par snang rlung nad yang bldang / khong nas srog ces bya ba'i khrag yod pa de smon cing 'byung na ma 
16a7(mdo 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur ro// skyugs sman btang legs ni de'i rjes la ci ran cig ngalag so ste/ de nas nad dmigs dang sbyar la/ dud pa rnam gsum gang yang rung ba cig gis bdugs la de'i 'og tu snum bag btang ba yang gong ma dang 
16b1(mdo 'grel): 'dra bar bya'o// de nas kha zas bza' ba ni phyi 'phred nus ka ram/ yang na sman legs par mazhu'am/ rjes ma chang na de nang bar tsam na gdod kha zas yi gar 'ong zhing bkres na chu dron po ran pas khrus byas la 
16b2(mdo 'grel): kha zas kyi rims pa 'bras thug kyang rgyang po la rim pa bzhin du bza' bar bya'o// bza' ba'i rim pa de yang dang po 'bras brdos pa'i thug pa byang rgyang po blud do// de nas 'bras brdos pa'i thug pa byar langs tsam du byas la blud 
16b3(mdo 'grel): dodo// de'i rjes la thugs pa kha gzar gyis bcu rung ba blud do// de'i rjes la sran tshod yu sha zhes bya ba bal po se'u 'bru dang sran bu dkar sbyar ba'i tshod ma dang 'bras bu can du spags shing bza' de nas sran mu ga dang / bal po 
16b4(mdo 'grel): se'u 'bru dang spos sna tshogs su sbyar ba'i tshod ma dang 'bras can du spags shing bza'/ mjug tu ni khu sha dang 'bras can du spags shing bza'o// de ltar smon pa'i rjes la kha zas tshos che chung bza' ba'i tshad ni skyugs sman 
16b5(mdo 'grel): legs te/ legs par slon la dang ka sang sang por byas na thug pa dang / sran tshod yu sha dang khu sha gsum char zos kyang rung ngo // 'bring tsam du smon na ni 'bras thug dang / sran tshod yu sha dang / rnam pa gnyis ka bzar rung 
16b6(mdo 'grel): ngo// smon pa'i babs chungs te/ chen por ma smon na ni khwa sha dang / kha zas sam 'bras dang sbyar zhing btsal lo// dper na me chung ste gso ba ni rtswa dang lte ba dang / rta drug dang / rtswa la sogs pas bags kyis gso zhing mkhang 
16b7(mdo 'grel): kyis sbar na me che ba brtan pa dang / thams cad tshes nus par byed nus pa de dang 'dra ste/ skyugs sman gyis nad bsal te/ dang ka sa la sal por bya ba la/ thog mar kha zas drags na mi rung ste/ 'bras thug sla mo la sogs 
16b8(mdo 'grel): paran par sbyin zhing drod cher bya'o// de la skyugs sman gyi lan bzhi bzhi smon na phabs chung ba'i tshod do// lan drug smon na smon pa'i 'bring tshad do// lan brgyang du son na skyugs sman legs pa'i tshad do// de las bkra sman gyis bkrus 
17a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i chung thang ni/ lan bcu 'khrus pa'o// 'bring tshad ni bcu gsum mo// me thang ni lan bcu bdun no// de las 'khrus pa'i babs chung zad ni drug phul gi tshad do// 'bring ni drug phul de'i tshad do// 'bras 
17a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i che ba ni drug phral bzhi 'gyur ro// de la skyugs sman gyis smon te cho ga'i tshad ni 'khrus pa'i phyed tsam ste/ mjug tu mkhris pa byang na cho ga ciran pa'i tshad do// de la bkru sman gyis bkru ste/ bkrus pa'i mjug tu bdakan 
17a3(mdo 'grel): byung na ran te chog go// bkru sman btang ba'i tshe dang po la thur du lan gnyis gsum tsam byung ba ni khong pa'i dri ma bshangs pa yin te/ 'khrus pa'i grangs su brtsi'o// skyugs sman btang ba ni sngags sman 'thungs nas bkrus te slon 
17a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang / mjug tu mkhris pa 'byung ba'i tshad kyis gzung ngo // skyugs sman gyis smon pa'i 'og tu snum bag btang ba dang / dugs bya ba yang zhag gsum 'am lnga'am/ bdun cho ga byas nas de'i rjes la gdod bkru sman btang ste/ 
17a5(mdo 'grel): de yang nad par bad kan gyi dus yol te/ lto sra snying tshod bzung la bkru sman btang ngo // de la mi'i rang bzhin mkhris pa che zhing mang la lto ste ste 'o mas kyang 'khru bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rang bzhin rlung gi shas chen lto sra ste 
17a6(mdo 'grel): bkru sman dri bod dang dan ti la sogs pas kyang bkru dka'o// de la mkhris pa che ba la sman bkru sman ro bskab dang mdar ba las btang ngo // bad kan che ba la sman tsha ba las btang ngo // rlung chen snum pa dang drod che ba dang 
17a7(mdo 'grel): lan tshwa las btang ngo // sman btang yang 'khrur mi rung na chu bskol bskol ba dron mo blad do// lag pa'i thal mo me la bsros pa 'am/ gos me la ba sros bsros pas dugs bya'o// bkra sman btang ba las de nyin par chen 
17a8(mdo 'grel): popo mi 'khrun thod de zan byin la byi de nyin bkru sman thong zhig gal te nad pa zas yi gar mi 'ong ste/ kha zas mi tshud dam lto sra bzhig na snum btang ba'i cho gzhag gsuma'am lnga'am bdun du btang bar bshad pa de bas zhag 
17b1(mdo 'grel): grangs bskyed de zhag bcu'i bar du snum bag thong zhig/ de'i rjes la lus la dugs kyi cho ga byas nas de'i 'og tu gdod bkru sman btang ngo // bkra sman btang ba de yang sngar lan cig 'khrus pa'i tshe/ bkrur ma btub pa de 
17b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs kyis nyes pa dang / ci las gyur pa legs par bltas te/ sngar cis nyes pa dran par byas te de las thabs ji ltar legs par bkru sman btang ngo // bkru sman btang ba las ma legs pa'i nad dmigs ste na lto 
17b3(mdo 'grel): ba nas zas mi 'ju ste/ gsung sgregs mnam por 'byung / kha zas yi ger mi 'ong bdakan mkhris pa gnyis rgyas pa smon par 'gyur/ g.yan pas 'debs tsha ba skye lu sa la thor bu 'byung cham pas 'debs thur du 
17b4(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi 'byang bshang ba 'byung sra ba 'di lta bu 'byung bar gyur na bkru sman ma legs pa yin no// de las bkru sman legs pa'i tshul nam ma legs pa'i gnad bshad pa las bzlog par bya ste/ de la dang por ni khong 
17b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i dri ma bshang brde 'byung ngo // de'i rjes la mkhris pa de nas bad kan tha ma rlung 'byung zhing de ltar 'khru ba ni legs par blta'o// de la bkru sman babs che ste ha cang drags pa ni bad kan zad de med pa dang / mkhris pa 
17b6(mdo 'grel): yang zad de med chu skya bor 'khru khrag rtsa nag por 'od yang na sha bkrus pa 'dra ba rtsa snar bag can nam chu ser lta bur 'byung tshil lta bu'i nar nar po 'am/ rus bu lta bu 'byung gzhang phyir 'byung zhing ltog kha skom klad pa 'khor 
17b7(mdo 'grel): mig chags te phugs su bros pa 'di lta bur gyur na bkru sman ha cang drags pa'i tshul yin no// bkru sman drags pa dang skyugs sman btang ba'i zas kyi cho ga dang 'dra bar bya'o// skyugs sman ltar btang ba'i cho ga las 
17b8(mdo 'grel): dud pas btang cho ga mi dgos so// bkru sman gyi rjes la kha zas bza' ba'i rim pa yang skyugs sman gyi cho ga bshad pa dang 'dra ste/ kha zas rims pas bza' zhing bags kyis kha zas nar ma yang phyi nas bza'o// 
18a1(mdo 'grel): gal te bkru sman btang ba las drod chung bas bkru sman ma zhu zhing nad ma phyin la long brnyas pa ni med nad dkyil ni che ba tsam ma yin na sman khong du ma zhi ba'i tshul de ltar gyur na 'di lta bu la dpyad du 
18a2(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba ni/ bkru sman 'thung ba'i nyin thog thag zas mi za bar mtshan yal nangs su nam zhu zhu ba'i bar du bsdad cing kha zas mi za'o// yod ni sngar snum dang dugs kyi cho gar byas la phyis bkru sman btang ba nad nud la 
18a3(mdo 'grel): gnod par mi 'gyur ro// bkru sman btang ste bkras pa dang gtar ka btab pa dang / snum gyi cho gar sbyar te btang ba dang / zas mi za bar spyasmyud par byas pa 'di rnams kyis ni drod chung zhing nyams par 'gyur ro// de bas na 
18a4(mdo 'grel): 'di lta bu la dpyad du bgyi ba ni 'bras thug rkyang rgyang po dang 'bras thug sla ba la sogs pa blud cing bags kyis btang ngo // bkru sman btang bas mkhris pa dang bad kan bri ste chung ngu gyur pa dang / rlung dang mkhris pa che ba'i mi 
18a5(mdo 'grel): ma da ma pa dam tha mal zung dum drung dag la khams sa dpal gags pa 'dapas mag tsug/ na maldan pa la phyugs smra // da la / pa das 
18a6(mdo 'grel): bkru sman btang ste nad bsal bar bya'o// skyugs sman btang ba ni bkru sman btang ba'i dus la bab ma bab pa/ nad smin pa la bsdad mi dgos par rung ngo // yang mi nyams chung zhing nad mang ba de lta bu la ni nang nyin smin cing 
18a7(mdo 'grel): bkru sman btang ba'i dus la bab na bkru sman btang mi dgos par 'khru bar 'gyur ba'i kha zas kyi cho ga byas na 'khru bar 'gyur ro// sngar bkru sman btang ste nyams chung ba dang nad kyang bri ste/ chung du gyur pa dang / mi sha chung ste/ 
18a8(mdo 'grel): skem pa dang / lto sra sti tshed ma zin pa 'di lta bra la sman thun chung ba dang / sman 'jam po thong zhig de lta bas na ches sman lan mang du 'thungs pa'i bla'o// dogs shing bag tsha bar gyur pa'i sman thun cher ni btang du mi rung ngo // 
18b1(mdo 'grel): nad pa nyams chung ba lta bu la ni sman 'jam zhing thun chung bas nad zhi bar bya'o// nad pa nyams chung ba la de ltar dpyad bya ste/ nad mang po cud zad khad kyis brin de yang sman bags kyis btang zhing nad khad kyis khang 
18b2(mdo 'grel): kyis bsal lo// nad dkyil bas phyin phyin pas nad pa yun ring du nyon mongs pa de lta bu drod chung lto sra bar gyur pa yin te de la dpyad du bya ba ni thal sman rnon pos gsha' ra dang / tshe tsha dang mar du sbyar ba btang na khong 
18b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i me drod skye ste/ zas 'ju rlung dang bad kan gyi nad kyang zhi nas de nas 'khru sman thod zhig/ nod pa'i nyams che la khong rtsu ba rlung gi shas che lto sra la rtag tu rtsol ba'i ngang tshul can/ khong pa'i drod che ba de lta bu ni 
18b4(mdo 'grel): bkru sman btang ba yang sman zhu bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de lta bu la ni sngar sman ma btang ba la nyams brtas nas phyis bkru sman 'jam po thong zhig gal te 'khrur mi rud dam lan 'ga' zhig 'khrus nas sman rnon po cung zad 
18b5(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar ba'i sman re red por mas bcug nas/ nad thur tu 'khrus te ma byin pas khong yang 'jam la bkru sman legs pa bde bar 'gyur ro// gong du bkru sman btang nas sngar snum gyi cho ga bya bar bshad pa de yang dug gis 
18b6(mdo 'grel): babs pa'i ming dang mtshon gyis rmas pa lta bu dang thor bu byung ba dang / mdze nad dang / 'or nad dang / me dpal dang / mig ser dang / skya sbab kyi nad dang / za khu'i nad yod pa dang / 'di lta bu rnams la ni snum gyi 
18b7(mdo 'grel): cho ga ha cang cher mi bya ba dang / bkru sman thong zhig de la snum bag gi cho ga bya ba dang / bkru sman btang ba dang // thams cad la nad med pa'i khong snum pa la snum gyi cho ga bya ste/ brtas la skyugs sman dang / bkru 
18b8(mdo 'grel): sman la sogs pa las bya zhing gad btang yang rung ste/ de dag gi bar dang / skabs skabs su snum gyis cho ga dang / dugs kyi cho ga bya'o// de ltar snam bag gi cho ga byas pa'i rjes la kha zas kyi nyams btsag 
19a1(mdo 'grel): brtan nas bkru sman gyis nad bsal ba ni dper na gos dri ma can spangs la bkru ba dang 'dra'o// de la snum gyi cho ga dang dugs la sogs pa ma byas par rang ga bkru sman gtod pa de ni shing skam 
19a2(mdo 'grel): po dgug tu mi rung ba bzhin du lus ma rung ba'i nyen du 'gyur ro// de la cho ga tshul bzhin du byas pa'i bkru sman btang ba legs par bya ba ni sems gsal ba dang dbang po rnams dang / srog zungs rnams brtan 
19a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang khong du drod che me 'bar zas myur du 'dzurgas sra bar 'ong ste/ bkra sman btang legs pa ni de lta bu yin no// skyugs sman dang bkru sman btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// 
19a4(mdo 'grel): sman mas btang nyams brta bar bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u bcu dgu pa bshad par bya'o// rlung nad kyi shas che ba de lta bu la ni sman mas btang zhid brta ste/ lus kyi khong snum par bya ba'i cho ga bzang ngo // de lta bas na
19a5(mdo 'grel): sman dpyad kyi bya ba thams cad kyi nang nas sman mas btang zhing khong snum zhing nyam brta bar bya ba 'di ni dpyad kyi mchog yin no// de yang rnam pa gsum ste nad 'khrur rung ba khong du bsdu ba'i sman mas btang ba dang / 
19a6(mdo 'grel): bkra sman drag po mas btang ba dang / khong brta ba'i sman mas btang ba dang / rnam pa gsum mo// sman mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di gsum gyis sman dang lto lbos pa dang / rkang pan te 'thengs pa dang / mcher 
19a7(mdo 'grel): pa na ba dang / rlung nad kyis lto 'khru ba dang / lto na pa dang / rims bying ba dang / cham pa na ba dang / rlung nad kyis khu chu 'gags pa dang / rlung nad las rtug skam du gyur te/ 'byung du mi rung ba dang / rlig 
19a8(mdo 'grel): rlugs dang / rde'u nad dang / khu chu la nad yod pa dang / rlung nad dkyil chen po gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mas btang ba rnam pa gsum gyis/ nad kun bsal bar bya'o// de la sman mas btang zhing bkrur 
19b1(mdo 'grel): mi rung ba'i nad dmigs ni snum bag btang ha cang drags pa dang glo rdol ba dang lus ha cang ske mche ste nyams chung ba lta bu dang / mchin pa na ste be'u snabs su 'khru ba dang / rtag tu smon bro ba dang / bkru sman 
19b2(mdo 'grel): gyis bkrus zin pa lta bu dang / sna nas sman btang zin pa dang / dbugs mi bde ste rngam pa drag tu 'byung ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang mchil ma mang ste rtag tu 'dong ba dang / gzhang 'bru ma khrag tshad kyis 
19b3(mdo 'grel): btab pa dang / skyugs bus btab pa lto spos pa dang / drod chung ste zas 'jur mi rung ba lta bu dang / gzhang kha spangs te na pas sman mas btang du mi rung ba lta bu dang / kha zas zos zin pa lta bu dang / dmu rdzing 
19b4(mdo 'grel): gnad kyis ca sgo kun 'gags pa dang / mdze nad dang za khu can du gyur te ga cin sbrang rtse'i mdog tu 'ong ba dang / bud med sbrum ma zla ba bdun las malon pa dang / 'di rnams lta bu la ni sngan mas btang zhing byar mi 
19b5(mdo 'grel): rung ngo // de la sman mas btang zhing nyams brtas te khong snum par bya ba dang / sman mas btang ba'i bkrur rung ba'i nad dmigs ni drod ha cang che ba dang / khong rtsub pa dang / rlud nad 'ba' zhig na ba las dmu rdzing 
19b6(mdo 'grel): dugyur pa lta bu dang / cham pas btab pa dang / ha cang sbomaches pa dang / lton srin bu yod pa dang / rlung nad kyi shas ha cang chas pa dang / dbyig dug 'thungs pa dang / 'bram bus btab pa dang / rkang 'bam 
19b7(mdo 'grel): gyi nad dang / lba ba can dang / 'di rnams lta bu'i nad la sman mas btang zhing bkur rung ngo // sman mas btang ba de dag gi cha dpyad spu bu ni gser la sogs pa dang / shing dang rus pa dang / 'di rnams 
19b8(mdo 'grel): kye gci' mags pa drang la 'jam pa la zlum par byas te/ chad ni byas pa na gnan te logacig malon na sred sor lnga'o// lo bdun ma lon na sringad sor drug go/ la bdun lon pa na srid mar bdun na/ 
20a1(mdo 'grel): lo bcu gnyis lon na sor dgu'o// lo nyi shu lon pa phan chad la sor bcu gnyis so// de yan chad lo grangs kyi bye brag dang / na tshe da dang / nyams stobs dang / lus bong las sbu gu'i tshad 
20a2(mdo 'grel): bskyed do// sbu gu'i tshad kyi sboms ni mthe bong shong ba'i tshad du bya'o// rtse mo'i sboms ni mthe'u chung gi tshad du bya'o// byis pa chung ngu lo gcig lon pa yan chad sor mo tshad las phyed phyed kyis de bskyed
20a3(mdo 'grel): de zhabs kyi bu ga'i sboms rab tu che ba dang / sor mo gsum gyis rtse mo nang du shod ba tsam du bya'o// gce'u'i rtse mo'i bu ga'i tshad ni mon sran rde'u dang / sran chung dang / sran ma 'di rnams btsos pa shong 
20a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang / rgya shug gi 'bras bu shong ba'i tshad che chung gi rim pa de ltar bya'o// gce'u'i rtse mo'i gong du khog pa gdags pa'i tshad ni gce'u'i bu ga sbom pa'i tshad dang mnyam par bya'o// gce'u nas sman gtong 
20a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshe gce'u'i rtse mo'i kha bkal ba'am/ pags pa bcad de ma bor bar byas nas btang ngo // gce' zhabs sbom po'i kha nas yang sor gnyis su gzhal bar khog pa can de nas mar rim pa gnyis su brtags 
20a6(mdo 'grel): la/ bug pa gnyis kyi bar du smad blugs pa'i snod lug dngar dang ma he la sogs pa'i lgang pa legs par mnyes pa tshon gyis dmar por bcos pa sra ba phur ma thag thug dang dring ba dang tsa'i ri mo 'di rnams 
20a7(mdo 'grel): med cing 'jam la sra ba de lta bu'i gce'u dang sbyar te srad bus legs par bcings la sman blugs na bde bar bya'o// gal te lgang pa'i rgyal bu med na rgyal ba'i dpung pa'am/ byin pa'i bags pa'am/ ras 
20a8(mdo 'grel): sngags po thags bzang ba spra tshil gyis byugs pa de lta bral snod du bya'o// de la smarna mas btang ste bkru ba'i tshad ni byis pa chung ngu lo gcig lon pa la srang gcig btang ngo // byis pa chung ngu de lta bu las 
20b1(mdo 'grel): le re re lon zhing sman srad re re bskyed de/ lo drug lon nas srang bcu gnyis btang do// de yan chad kyang lo grangs las srang gnyis gnyis su bskyed de lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang / lo bco brgyad lon pa 
20b2(mdo 'grel): nas lo bcu bdun lon pa man chad la spyir sman btang ba'i tshul ni thun rab tu chen yang srang nyi shu btad do// sman mas btang ste bkru ba'i thun srang ji snyed cig btang ba de las dpags te nyams brta zhing khong 
20b3(mdo 'grel): snyam par byas pa'i sman mas btang ba bzhi cha gcig gi tshad du bya'o// de lta bas na nyams brta ba'i smarna mas btang du rung ba'i me snum bag btang ba dang / dugs bya ba'i cho ga yang byas/ bkru sman 
20b4(mdo 'grel): btang ste/ nad gi nad kyang bsal 'bras thug sla mo dang gar po la sogs pas nyams bcag kyang brtas nas nyams brta ba'i sman btang du rung bar shes na thog ma nyid du nyams brta ba'i sman mas btang par
20b5(mdo 'grel): bya'o// nyam brta ba'i yang dgun zla bzhi dang dpyid zla gnyis kyi tshe ni nyin par thong zhig/ kha cig na re zla ba 'di drug gi tshe mtshan mo yang btang du rung zhes zer ro// so ga dang dbyar dang ston gyi tshe ni mtshan 
20b6(mdo 'grel): mo thod zhig/ de la khong snum zhing nyams brta ba'i sman mas btang bar bya na/ cho ga sngar bya ba la lus mar gyis bsku zhing lde gus dril la chu dron pos lus dag par bkru/ dro'i kha zas kyi tshad sngan ci za ba'i 
20b7(mdo 'grel): thad las bzhi cha gsum ni bza' bzhi cha cig ni mi bza'/ kha zas ci za ba yang phan pa yang ba snum ches pa yang ma yin/ rtsu ba ches pa yang ma yin pa de lta bu zos la khu ba la sogs pa skom gyi gor 
20b8(mdo 'grel): btung ba dang / tshal nan yang btung ngo // kha zas zos pa'i rjes la bcag pa byas nas bshang gau ci brtsal la mal bde bar 'dug na sngas smad nas ro smad bstod de/ glo g.yon gyis phab nas rkang pa 
21a1(mdo 'grel): g.yas pa bsum kang pa g.yon ni skyong zhig/ de nas gce'u yi nang nas sngan mas btang ste gce'u'i kha dang gzhang kha yang snum gyis bsku'o// gce'u yi lgang pa nang du sman blugs la blugs phyir phyung nas kha 
21a2(mdo 'grel): bcings la/ sman pa nad pa'i rgyab logs su 'dug nas/ rtabs bag tu sman myur du btang ba 'am/ dal zhing thogs pa ma yin par bya zhing gce'u'i nang nas sman nang du btang zhing brtser ba'i shugs ha cang 
21a3(mdo 'grel): drags pa'am/ dal ba yang ma yin/ ngan par cig car lan cig tu bcing cing thong zhig/ lgang pa'i zhabs na rlung lus pa yod kyi sman gyi lhag ma ma lus par gyis shig/ sman btang zin nas brla dang rkub 
21a4(mdo 'grel): chos la thal mos brdab cing gan rgyal du bzhag la nad pa nyid rang gi lam la rkang pa'i rting pas brdung bar bya'o// sman pa 'am/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rkang pa nas bteg stel na gsum du bsigs shig/ 
21a5(mdo 'grel): de nas nad pa snga sa bcug nas brkyang ste/ nyal la rkang pa'i rting par nad g.yog gi khu tshur gyis brdung ba 'am/ parla dang byin pa la yang khu tshur brdung zhing lus snum gyis bskus la mnye bar bya'o// lus
21a6(mdo 'grel): la brdung zhing mnyes la mi bde bar byas pa des/ sman slar myur du phyir mi dbyung ngo // gal te sman slar myur du phyir byung bas phan mi byed par gyur na/ sman mar phyi ma gzhan yang sbyar la btang ngo // khong
21a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i drod che bas sman mas btang bzhun nub kar kha zas kyang bza'o// zas zos nas de phan chad mtshan thog zag tu ci yang mi bza' mi btang bar nyol cig/ gal te sman phyir 'byung du mi rung na sman sbyar ba'i 
21a8(mdo 'grel): stang bu'am/ sman rnon po lgang pa na sa mas btang zhing khong na sman mar lus pa phyir dpung ngo // gal te khong pa'i nang na ha cang rtsub ches pas sman mazhu ste phyir ma byung ba dang / khong pa'i drod chungs pas 
21b1(mdo 'grel): sman ma zhu ste/ phyir ma byung la nang du gyur pa med na bsdad par bya zhing mtshan mo de bzhin du 'dug par bya'o// nang par li dong ra dang / 'u su bskol ba'i chu 'am yang na chu 'ba' zhig gdus pa
21b2(mdo 'grel): btung bar bya'o// nyam brta ba'i sman mas btang na nyi ma gsum 'am/ nyi ma lnga lon na yang thong zhig/ gal te 'ju ba'i drod che bas sman zhu ba'am/ yang na rlung gi shas ha cang ches pa dang / 
21b3(mdo 'grel): rtag tu rtsol zhing bcag pa byed pa dang / me'i drod ha cang che ba dang / khong pa'i nang rtsub pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mas btang ba'i nyi ma re re btang du rung ngo // de ltar khong snum zhing nyams brta ba'i sman
21b4(mdo 'grel): mas btang ba lan gsum lan bzhi btang nas lus kyi khong dang rtsa 'jam zhing snum par nad dbyung zhing bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ bkru ba'i sman mas btang zhing snang bar bya'o// sngan lus kyis khong rtsub 
21b5(mdo 'grel): pa las snum par bya ba'i 'og tu nyi ma lnga lon na tshes grangs bzang po'i nyi ma cung zad phyed yol tsam na sman pas gtor ma bkra shis kyi tshig byas la nad pa lus til mar gyis byugs dugs byas bshang 
21b6(mdo 'grel): gci'i dri ma gsal la/ ha cang bkres pa tsam ma yin par 'dug la nad kyi dmigs dang sman la sogs pa la mkhas pa'i mi dang / gang de la mkhas pa mang po dang / lhan cig tu 'gro zhing sman mas 
21b7(mdo 'grel): btang ba'i bkru sman drag po de la sman gyi khu ba spangs pa chu srang brgyad bcu'i bzhi cha gcig ste srang nyi shu dang / po son cha'i 'bras bu 'brum bu brgyad dang sbyar te btso zhing de'i nang du mar ni sman gyi khu ba srang nyi shu'i 
21b8(mdo 'grel): bzhi ma cig du blugs te bcom 'di ni drung nad la btang na thabs da ltar sbyar ro// mkhris pa na bal btang ba dang / nab med pa nyam tha mal pa la btang na sman \u0f7f khrab srang nyi shu rtsa drug cha cig gi zang du 
22a1(mdo 'grel): blugs te/ btso bar bya'o// bad kan gyi nad che ba la btang na sman gyi khu ba srang nyi shu'i brgyad cha cig gi thang du mar blags te/ btso bar bya'o// yang na nad thams cad la sman gyi khu ba'i 
22a2(mdo 'grel): brgyad cha gcig gi thang du mar blugs te bco'o// bkru ba'i sman mas btang ba btso pa de yang ha cang mi bskami sla bar sbyar zhing btso'o// de'i nang du bu ram srang gcig tsam dang sbrang rtsi dang / lce tsha la 
22a3(mdo 'grel): sogs pa nad dmigs dang sbyar zhing ci rigs par spags te/ sman lhag ma sbyar te/ sman de thams cad snod cig tu blugs la/ bum pa chu tshan bskol ba'i rlangs pa'i khar bsro zhing / sman dkrug dkrug 
22a4(mdo 'grel): la sngan gtong ba'i gce'u rtsal pa'i nang du thugs te/ ha cang mtsha ma grang ha cang mi snum me rtsub ha cang mi rnam 'jam/ ha cang mi gar mi slaha cang mi nyung mi mang ce tsha med pa'am tsha bar yang mi bya/ de dang 
22a5(mdo 'grel): 'dra bar 'bras tsam kyang / mi mang mi nyung bar sbyar te/ sman mas btang zhes mkhas pa kha cig ni de skad zad do// yang sman pa kha cig na dmar dang sbrang rtsi gnyis kyi tshad so sor srang gsum gsum 
22a6(mdo 'grel): dang na ba med cing nyam tha mal bzhig la btang na lce tshan gnyis po son 'cha' dang shu til sogs pa brang gnyis spangs pa'i khu ba dang / sman lhag ma'i khu ba srang bcur sbyar te sman khwa spangs spangs pa mar 
22a7(mdo 'grel): dang bcos la sbrang rtsi dang lce tshar sbyar te/ rim pa 'di ltar byas sngan btang ba'i rgyal bur thugs la/ bkru ba'i sman mas btang ba'i cho ga de ltar bya'o// de la rlung nad sel ba'i sman mas btang zhing bkru bar 
22a8(mdo 'grel): sbyar na shing nye rong dang lce tsha sa na da ba dang nye'u shing pa dang a shwa gan+da dang / e raN+Da'i la ma sman dang zhing 'jam pa dang sbyang ba dang dro ba'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'di lta bu'i sman rnams ni rlung nad sel ba'i sman mas 
22b1(mdo 'grel): btang bar bzad do// mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sman mas btang zhing bkru ba'i rnam grangs la gtogs pa la shing n+ya gro d+ha dang / shing u dum+bad dang / shing khrag sha dang / shakra dang / shing mngar
22b2(mdo 'grel): dang / 'o ma dang / nye'u shing dang / 'bri mar dang / ra mngar zhing bsil ba rnams dang / bu ram shing gi khu ba sbrang rtsi dang 'di rnams ni mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sman mas btang zhing bkru bar bzang
22b3(mdo 'grel): ngo // bad kan rgyas pa'i nad sel ba ni dong ka dang / dug mo yungs dang pa ta lig dang / tshis khrigs dang / shing nim+ba dang / sle tres dang / pa Da dang / ka tu kha ro ha ni dang / shing gi khu ba she le ya kha dang / 
22b4(mdo 'grel): pu ti ka rany+dza dang / rak+ta ka rany+dza dang / sap+ta pan+d+ha zhes bya ba tshigs re la lo ma bdun yod pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang ba gcin dang / sman ro tsha zhing rno ba dang che ba rnams dang tsha ba rnams sbyar te btsos la sman mas 
22b5(mdo 'grel): btang zhing bkrus na/ bad kan gyi nad sel to// de la rlung nad dang mkhris pa dang / bad kan gsum char gyi nad 'dus par gyur na yang / de gsum gyi sman gong du bshad pa las nad so so'i sman cing ran 
22b6(mdo 'grel): du shas shas kyi bsdus pa bcos pa'i thun spyir mi che ba ngan par mas btang ba'i bkru sman drag po btang ngo // brtas bkru ba'i sman mas btang nas sngas kyis brten te gan rgyal du sems gung du mi g.yengs 
22b7(mdo 'grel): par sman btang ba de la yid bzhag par bya'o// de nas thur du bkru zhing 'ong bar gyur na langs te tsog pur 'dug la bshang bar gyis shig/ gal te 'khyim na skad cig thogs te phol du ma rung na sman 'di nyen che ste/ 
22b8(mdo 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu nyen du gyur pa la slar bcos shing dpyad du bya ba la mar dang nas tshig 'khrus pa'i thal sman rnon po dang / ba gcin dang 'bras kyi rtsabs kyi khu ba sgyur mo dang sbyar la bcos pa 'jam 
23a1(mdo 'grel): zhing rnol dro bar sbyar te/ sman mas btang ba'i rgyal bu gzhan du blugs te bshams la mas btang zhing tsher cig/ yang na po son cha las sbyar ba'i sman gyi sa gdab mu las gzhug 
23a2(mdo 'grel): pa bya zhing sdang ba yang bya'o// yang na 'di ltar ma gyur te sman mas btang yang 'ong bar gyur na sman phyi ma sbyar te/ rgyal bur blugs la lan gsum lan bzhi'i bar du yang sman drags po mas btang 
23a3(mdo 'grel): zhing legs par btang nas de'i rjes la kha zas kyi cho ga ni bkru sman btang ba'i cho ga dang 'dra bar shes par byas la kha zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol du chu dron pos khrus byas nas bza' ba'i thabs ni 'bras 
23a4(mdo 'grel): thugs kyang kyang po dang / 'bras thug sra mo btung sha khra sra ma dang 'bras chan du sbyar te bza'/ sman drag po mas btang ste bkrus pas khong pa'i dri ma nad kun byin na/ khong pa nang 'phyang bag tu 'dug 
23a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang / nyams chung ste khong rgya ba de lta bur gyur pa de la chu dron po bde bas khrus byas nas kha zas cho ga bzhin du zos na lus zhig cing rmya ba la phan te/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te sman de ltar mas 
23a6(mdo 'grel): btang ste/ bkrus pa las rlung nad kyi bar du khong dbo bas grang bar 'gyur te/ mi bden yang de'i mod la 'phral du rlung zhi bar 'gyur ba'i sman btsos te mas btang zhing khong 'jam zhing snum par 'gyur
23a7(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o// sman mas btang ste bkrus pa legs pa'i tshu la dang / ha cang drags pa dang thun chungs te ma 'khrus par gyur pa 'di rnams kyi tshul ni sngar snam gyi cho ga bya zhing btang ba legs ma legs 
23a8(mdo 'grel): bshad pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o// sman mas btang ste bkrus pa'i rjes rlung nad du gyur pa la khong 'jam zhing snum par gyur ba'i sngan mas btang ba cung zad tsam zhig bsdad na khong nga'i drim bshang ba
